item.description:
﻿BE Who Your Soul Wants You to Be:  The Lightworkers Healing Method

The Work of Lynn McGonagill with Betsy Barlow

 

 

I have been on the receiving end of the Lightworker Healing Method (LHM) and will be sharing my experience of this work.  The Ligherworker Healing Method (LHM) has an exceptional goal for an energy healing modlity: to align us with our soul's life purpose.﻿﻿

 

It is both a spirtual growth vehicle and a healing system.  LHM improves the present by working with both past and future lives as well as higher-dimension-Guides, Angels and Lightbeings in a unique and powerful process.  This is something that anyone can learn to do.  Channeling Divine healing is not a gift; it is a teachable, learnable skill, according to Lynn McGonagill, founder nd teaching channel of the Lightworker Healing Method (LHM).

 

Though I practice Jin Shin Jyutsu, I also welcome other avenues for healing and new awareness.  Lynn's work, for me, was transformative, and I look forward to sharing my experience with this system at the July meet-up.  In September 2012, Lynn will bring her Lightworker Healing Method to Boston, and will teach the core of this method.  She has written an eBook about this method that will be out in July.  Paperback will follow in September.  If you would like  free copy of the book, I can make arrangements for you to receive one.

 

Lynn's website is www.lightworkersmethod.com.

 

We begin with a potluck lunch and networking/community building at 11:30 am.  The presentation is from 12:15 - 1:15 pm.

 

Let us know what you are bringing to the potluck when you RSVP.

 

Meetup fee:  $10
item.how_to_find_us: I'll welcome you at the door!
item.name: July Meetup: BE Who Your Soul Wants You to Be: The Lightworkers Healing Method
